SELECT ic.comment_level as commentLevel, ic.content as content, ic.spec_name as specName, i.created_time as createdTime, u.face as userFace, u.nickname as nickName FROM items_comments ic LEFT JOIN users u ON ic.user_id = u.id WHERE ic.item_id = #{paramsMap.itemId}
AND ic.comment_level = #{paramsMap.level}

SELECT i.id as itemId, i.item_name as ItemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount as minPrice FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT item_id,MIN(price_discount) as priceDiscount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) tempSpec ON i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
AND item_name like '%#{paramsMap.keyWords}%'
ORDER BY
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc
